column4: I know this isnt the right place but, I recently tried to install OpenSuse KDE and at the end it told me grub couldnt install so now its installed but i have no bootloader to load into it. it just loads into windows.
well im using opensuse, how can i install grub from windows or a live cd?
im sure google will tell you
im sure google will tell you on 500,000+ pages*
